Articles.Content:
do a grand tour.

as fast as kerbally possible:

your score is:

your time in hours, from your first rocket launch, to your landing at kerbin

lowest score wins!

divisions:

minimalist: >20 ton rocket

medium weight: 21-29 tonnes

maximalmalist: <30 ton rocket

--------------------------------------

presteige:

eve superiority I: land in atleast 3 biomes on eve

eve superiority II: land in all biomes on eve

eve superiority MARK: collect all the science in the eve system

joolian superiority: collect all science in the joolian system

i will add more here!

--------------------------------------

extra score modifiers:

-1000 pts for using a spaceplane

-500 pts for dropping nothing during the grand tour

-50 pts if the launch vehicle is resuable; that money stuff is expensive!c

-50 pts if the launch vehicle is a ssto

-10000 pts if you somehow to do it using ONLY SRBs

if there is anything else, i will add it here!

RULES:

no cheating (part clipping ok)

land on ALL bodies

you only need to stay on a planet long enough to:

-not fall over

-get out

-plant a flag

-get back in

one craft must do the entire tour.

(if you detach a lander, land and reattach it later, that's ok)

(the two craft must be in the same SOI)

screenshots required at points:

pre-launch

liftoff

on atmospheric exit

when stable orbit is reached (in map);show PE

the following only apply if you dock: {

when within 100m of craft to dock with

lined up to dock

post-dock

}

(i will be fairly leniant with this)

if you post more thats awesome!

if you make a video thats even more awesome!

MODS:

all mods are ok except for these:

extra planetary launchpads

kethane

any and all warp drive mods

i will make a banner sometime soon(ish)

Good luck and godspeed!
30 ton grand tour? You do realize that the only thing possible is fly-bys right?

30 ton grand tour? You do realize that the only thing possible is fly-bys right?

30T in orbit could do a fly-by grand tour. 30T on the launch pad? Even air-hogging, I don't think so.

30T in orbit could do a fly-by grand tour. 30T on the launch pad? Even air-hogging, I don't think so.

lol, I was thinking of doing a grand tour and limited myself to about 80T(max 100T).... That's payload not rocket...... and I would need 5 maybe 6 of them. :-P A grand tour challenge in it's self some one should host a grand tour challenge the same way Ziv hosted the Jool-5 challenge.

Edited February 20, 2015 by ttnarg
